title: Digital Silence
content: The most underrated digital skill may be the ability to sit with a question before reaching for search. Cultivating the patience to think through problems creates deeper neural pathways than immediately outsourcing cognition.

title: Simplicity
content: Complexity is a cost rarely accounted for. Every additional feature or option creates a tax on cognition. The reward of simplicity compounds just as dramatically as the cost of complexity.

title: Reality Checks
content: What if we performed "reality checks" on our beliefs the way we do for our code? Reality doesn't compile with faulty assumptions and mental modelsâ€”it just fails subtly and continuously until we notice the bugs.
